activitiesCleared.statDescription: 这是你总共成功完成的活动次数。守护者，但愿这个数字会大于你总共的进入次数！

secondsPlayed.statDescription: 在清理高塔的威胁时所投入的时间。这儿并没有投入时间太少这个说法。

currentCompetitiveRating.statDescription: 玩家当前的竞技段位分数。

currentEloRating.statDescription:
玩家当前的 Elo 分数。

这里所显示的分数是来自第三方网站 _Destiny Tracker_ 的数据。 _Destiny Tracker_ 提供了所有游玩过 _熔炉竞技场_ 和 _智谋_ 的《命运》系列玩家的相关 Elo 分数数据。

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_3a.statDescription: As a team, defeat all opposing Guardians at least once during the Hunt.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_3b.statDescription: Survive a Hunt in which no member of your team is defeated—then start the next Hunt.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_2a.statDescription: Complete an Iron Banner match with the most combined Advantage and Hunt kills.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_2b.statDescription: Defeat five opponents while holding Zone Advantage before the opposing team recaptures a zone.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_2c.statDescription: In a single life, participate in capturing all three zones leading to the Hunt.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_2d.statDescription: Survive your opponents' Hunt without being defeated.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_1a.statDescription: In a single life, defeat three opponents attempting to capture allied capture zones.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_1b.statDescription: Recapture a zone within 15 seconds of it being captured by your opponents.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_1c.statDescription: Defeat two or more opponents with Zone Advantage within 10 seconds of capturing a zone.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_control_1d.statDescription: Capture a zone with your entire team present.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_multi_entire_team.statDescription: Land final blows on the entire enemy team before any of them respawn.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_payback.statDescription: Land the final blow on the Guardian who last defeated you.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_avenger.statDescription: Land the final blow on an opponent who just defeated an ally.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_defender.statDescription: Land the final blow on an opponent who has recently damaged an ally.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_huge.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 50 opposing Guardians.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_lg.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 20 opposing Guardians.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_no_damage.statDescription: Land final blows on seven opponents without taking any damage from any source.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_shutdown_larg.statDescription: Shut down an opponent's streak of 20 or more.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_med.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 10 opposing Guardians.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_team.statDescription: As a team, defeat 7 opposing Guardians without any member of your team being defeated.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_sm.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 5 opposing Guardians.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_comeback.statDescription: Defeat 3 opponents in a single life after having been defeated two consecutive times.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_streak_combined.statDescription: In a single life, defeat 3 opposing Guardians while assisting or assisted by your teammates.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_match_undefeated.statDescription: Complete an Iron Banner match in which you defeat at least seven opponents and are never defeated by an opponent.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_match_blowout.statDescription: Win an Iron Banner match with a large margin of victory.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_match_most_damage.statDescription: Deal the most total damage to opponents in a single Iron Banner match.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_match_comeback.statDescription: Win an Iron Banner match after having trailed by a significant margin.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_match_never_trailed.statDescription: Win an Iron Banner match in which your team never trailed.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_match_overtime.statDescription: Win an Iron Banner match in overtime.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_cycle.statDescription: In a single Iron Banner match, land at least one final blow with each class of weapon (Kinetic, Energy, Power) and ability (melee, grenade, Super).

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_first_strike.statDescription: Land the first final blow of the match.

Medals_pvp_medal_ib_super_shutdown.statDescription: Stop an opponent's Super with your Super.
